test_strategy_covers_all_types.detail: Unit (30 tests across 5 categories), Integration (3 tests), Edge cases (12 tests), Performance (1 test), Format validation (5 tests) = 51 total test cases

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.detail: All 6 FRs (FR-01 through FR-06) and 5 NFRs (NFR-01 through NFR-05) covered. All 30 acceptance criteria have corresponding test cases.

traceability_matrix_complete.detail: 100% requirement coverage: 35 requirement items (30 ACs + 5 NFRs) mapped to 51 test cases. 15 error codes mapped. 12 edge cases mapped. No orphan requirements.

coverage_targets_defined.detail: 100% requirement coverage, 95%+ structural branch coverage, 100% error scenario coverage (all 15 error codes), 100% edge case coverage (all 12 design edge cases)

test_data_strategy_documented.detail: 4 fixture templates defined (iteration-requirements.json, artifact-paths.json, constitution.md, workflows.json). Directory structure documented. 5 fixture helper functions specified.

critical_paths_identified.detail: 5 critical paths: fail-open contract, template variable resolution, config lookup order (dual-path), constitution article mapping, workflow override deep merge

error_taxonomy_covered.detail: All 15 error codes (E-INP-001 through E-RT-002) from design Section 4 mapped to test cases

edge_cases_covered.detail: All 12 design edge cases (EC-01 through EC-12) mapped to test cases

article_II.detail: All 51 test cases designed in Phase 05 before implementation in Phase 06. Test file structure and conventions documented for TDD workflow.

article_VII.detail: Traceability matrix maps all 30 ACs and 5 NFRs to test cases. Error taxonomy and edge case catalogs also fully traced. 100% coverage confirmed by automated verification.

article_IX.detail: All required artifacts present: test-strategy.md, test-traceability-matrix.csv, gate-05-test-strategy.json. GATE-05 checklist all items passed.

article_XI.detail: 3 integration tests (TC-I01, TC-I02, TC-I03) validate full pipeline across all 4 config file sources with realistic data. TC-I03 specifically tests workflow override merging across components.
